title: Jazz Moods - Cocktail Party (2000) [Jazz][mp3 320][h33t][schon55
description:
Jazz Moods - Cocktail Party 
Original Release Date: September 12, 2000 
Audio CD: September 12, 2000 
Label: Concord Records 
Bitrate: 320 kbps

The swankiest of the releases in the Jazz Moods series, Cocktail Party combines songs from smooth characters like Benny Goodman, Johnny Mercer, and Jimmy Van Heusen with fun songs by the likes of Jimmy Durante and Fats Waller. The result is both stylish and celebratory, and great background music for whatever soirÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©e you may be hosting. ~ Stacia Proefrock, All Music Guide

Concord Jazz and Nick Phillips (producer) present "JAZZ MOODS - COCKTAIL PARTY", thirteen tracks sure to make your next party a swingin' success for every guest to fit every mood - a fine instrumental collection of music that's sure to add both a 100-proof spike and a touch of classic and sophistication to that next social gathering. 

Step back, here are the stand outs ~ "FLY ME TO THE MOON"(Bart Howard), features Joey DeFrancesco's Goodsfellas groovin' the hippest beat - "SATIN DOLL" (Mercer/Strayhorn/Ellington), Kenny Burrell captures the moment for your party - "INKA-DINKA-DO" 
(Jimmy Durante/Ben Ryan), Herb Ellis & Ray Brown perform Durante's theme song in a big way - "HOT TODDY" (Hendler/Flanagan), Gene Harris my all-time favorite hard funk blues piano player, puts his signature on this one, perfectly - gotta love it! Entire album is as essential for your next Cocktail Party as the beverage, snacks and good company---so "Jazz Fans:, spin this CD 

and let's party! ~ J. Lovins "Mr. Jim"
Jazz Moods - Cocktail Party Tracks:
01 Joey DeFrancesco's Goodfellas - Fly Me to the Moon
02 Monty Alexander - Come Fly With Me
03 Flip Phillips & Scott Hamilton - A Smooth One
04 Kenny Burrell - Satin Doll
05 Stanley Cowell - Jitterbug Waltz
06 Herb Ellis & Ray Brown - Inka-Dinka-Do
07 Marian McPartland with Tommy Flanagan - Jeepers Creepers
08 Jimmy Bruno - Witchcraft
09 Ruby Braff & Roger Kellaway - I Want to Be Happy
10 Gene Harris - Hot Toddy
11 Dave McKenna - A Shine on Your Shoes
12 Ken Peplowski - Pretend
13 Ray Brown Trio - Ja-Da
